channel.title: Yell when a player receives a 99
channel.description:
How do I make it so the server yells to everyone when a player receives a 99 skill or gets maxed?
(I'm using Delta as base)

item.title: Yell when a player receives a 99
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

I’m using Delta as base. Anyone please?

Read full topic
item.source: Yell when a player receives a 99

item.title: Yell when a player receives a 99
item.dc:creator: @Lucas7 Lucas7
item.description:
@Lucas7 wrote:

See if you can find the .java file that handles leveling up. Then just add something like this…

if (level == 99) for (Player players : World.getPlayers()) { players.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "<col=006600><shad=000000><img=6>News:<col=ff0033>" + player.getDisplayName() + " Has Reached Level 99 in <col=ff0033>" + name + "</col>"); }

Usually this is located in the LevelUp.java

Read full topic
item.source: Yell when a player receives a 99
